All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Collider
* Handles all collisions except sword collisions
Controller
* Handles all key inputs
Credits
* Sets the window to black, to allow for credits to be presented
Currency
* Creates coin currency which awards the player +20 points
Enemy
* Creates the structure for an enemy
Heart
* Heart pickup which awards the player +1 health or +10 points if their health is full
Jumper
* Used to differentiate between teleporters
Main
 
Manager
* handles the switching between different levels
One
* Creates the layout of the first level
Player
* Creates a playable character
Projectile
* Creates a short-ranged projectile used to detect sword collision
Reader
* Reads/Writes into a .txt file to keep track of high-s√•cores
Sword
* Handles the projectile collision for the sword
Teleporter
* Used to progress between levels as well jump distances between 2 points in a level
Three
* Creates the layout of the third level
Tracker
* Constantly monitors certain actions every fame
Two
* Creates the layout of the second level
Window
* Handles the GUI
